name: RutlandHeraldSports
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Our sports department makes a priority of covering high school sports, and local sports. Our overall goal is to be inclusive of young athletes, recognize the coaches, and provide depth and context in game reporting. We think recording wins and losses is important, but not as important as introducing a new generation to our community and helping them learn through athletics how to become good citizens.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
